title: Conference Talks

links.title: Links
links.description: A collection of links related to the parent topic.
links.name: links

items.title: Link
items.description: A link may link to any given URL; you will need to parse the media type to find out what it is.

rel.title: Link relation

href.title: Link URL
href.description: The actual link, as an URL.
href.name: href

presenter.title: Presenter
presenter.description: A presenter of the proposed conference talk.

name.title: Presenter Name

email.title: Presenter Email address

airport.title: Presenter Home Airport
